item.title: ECG Helps Detect Cardiac Involvement in Sarcoidosis
item.description: ECG detects cardiac sarcoidosis with a high sensitivity and negative predictive value in patients with cutaneous sarcoidosis. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Dance Intervention Reduces Sarcopenia, Falls in Older Adults
item.description: A 12-month dance intervention requiring just two sessions a week improves strength and cognition and reduces falls. Medscape Medical News

item.title: A Doctor’s Guide to Divorce
item.description: Physicians face unique legal, financial, and psychological issues when ending a marriage. From practice valuation to custody, here’s what you need to ...

item.title: Helping Patients With Chronic Illnesses Manage Their Life
item.description: Physicians can — and should — help patients plan their return to daily life, including dealing with obstacles at work. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Plasma p-tau181 Signals Early Alzheimer's Disease Risk
item.description: Plasma p-tau181 is a promising biomarker that can help identify Alzheimer's disease pathology and distinguish those who are at risk for conversion to ...
